DocAttribute.Name: BasisSurface
DocAttribute.Documentation: The surface to which the parameter values relate.

DocAttribute.Name: PointParameterU
DocAttribute.Documentation: The first parameter value of the point location.

DocAttribute.Name: PointParameterV
DocAttribute.Documentation: The second parameter value of the point location.

DocAttribute.Name: Dim
DocAttribute.Documentation: The space dimensionality of this class, determined by the space dimensionality of the basis surface.
